OUTTAKE 9: Packing Crates 3 "Chemical Wit"

Oct 5, 2021

Hello everyone! For this outtake, another ‘Crate Packing’ puzzle! I just had to know if having only two clues per line was doable—your mileage may vary on whether I succeeded :D The rules are are follows (all clues are cryptic):

  1. each row (1-15) is a sequence of two words, as clued on the right.
  2. each crate (a-z) contains a single word or phrase, clued on the left alphabetically by answer.
    Good luck!

    Answers: crates 3 solution.png
    Full puzzle image: crates 3 puzzle.png
